DOC.detailed_description: The cannabinoid type 1 ( CB ( 1 ) ) receptor one abundant G protein-coupled receptor brain ( Matsuda et al 1990 ) . It find glutamatergic , dopaminergic , gamma aminobutyric acid ( GABA ) -ergic synaptic terminal mediate effect endocannabinoids ( ECs ) , suppress release neurotransmitter . The CB ( 1 ) receptor target drug therapy , include use CB ( 1 ) receptor antagonist appetite suppressant . Our laboratory recently develop promising positron emission tomography ( PET ) ligand CB ( 1 ) receptor : [ ( 11 ) C ] SD5024 ( Donohue et al 2008a ) . Previous study laboratory use two PET ligand image CB ( 1 ) receptor ( 11 ) C-MePPEP ( 18 ) F-FMPEP-d ( 2 ) ( Yasuno et al 2008 ; Donohue et al 2008b ) find latter provide accurate precise measurement . We also find clearance ( 11 ) C-MePPEP brain slow ( 11 ) C-labeling ( Terry et al 2010 ) . Although currently use [ ( 18 ) F ] FMPEP-d ( 2 ) , major disadvantage current radioligand wash slowly brain , accurate quantitation require relatively fast washout . If [ ( 11 ) C ] SD5024 amenable quantitation human subject , may prove useful ligand study potential pathophysiological change receptor . The purpose protocol ( 1 ) perform brain image use [ ( 11 ) C ] SD5024 healthy volunteer characterize brain uptake distribution ; ( 2 ) perform whole body PET study healthy volunteer order estimate radiation absorb dos [ ( 11 ) C ] SD5024 ; ( 3 ) perform brain test-retest study healthy volunteer examine precise measurement receptor binding , determine optimal parameter future experiment use [ ( 11 ) C ] SD5024 . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Any recent past history psychiatric illness severe systemic disease base history physical exam .
